pullrequest.title: Joint control menu read current values

content.raw: I think this is a great idea for improving U/I responsiveness, but I think this could introduce some concurrency issues / race conditions. To test this, I added a 1 second wait in the `JointController::OnJointCmdReq` service callback, and I can get gazebo to crash when switching between models that have PID gains set. I think the asynchronous callback may need some more checking to be added.
